challenge.title: APEX Calculus - Chapter 1
challenge.description: Jennifer Bowen, Gregory Hartman, Brian Heinold, Troy Siemers, and Dimplekumar Chalishajar's APEX Calculus covers Calculus I.
challenge.instructions: Read Chapter One and complete all the questions with selected solutions.
